comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: The J. P. Stevens textile company had roots going all the way back to 1813. In the twentieth century, it was notorious for its diehard opposition to union organization. It filed for bankruptcy in 1999.

comment.author: 36380617@N06
comment._content: The founder of the J.P. Stevens company was John Peters Stevens (1868-1929), who lived in Plainfield, N.J.  Could this be him?

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: I'm not sure if it is the same person, Political Graveyard, nor why his photo would be published in 1915. We need a little more information.
